explanation: This email is a phishing attempt designed to trick the user into clicking a malicious link by creating a false sense of urgency. The sender domain is spoofed and the URL is not related to Amazon.
user_response: Thanks for reporting this. The email you received is a phishing attempt. Please do not click any links or download attachments. You can safely delete the message.
internal_summary: Phishing email impersonating Amazon with spoofed domain (amz-on.com) and credential-harvesting link. Reported and no user action taken. No compromise detected.
